data.text: Hah, hah… haah.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Hah, hah… haah.

data.text: …Ah! Oh no! Umm… F-Fukukitaru? Everyone…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…Ah! Oh no! Umm… F-Fukukitaru? Everyone…?

data.text: S-Suzuka-san, you went too fast…!!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed: 󠁿S-Suzuka-san, you went too fast…!!

data.text:
Haa… When you get lost in thought you end up running 
too far away from campus. At this rate, we might 
not make it back in time for school.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Haa… When you get lost in thought you end up running 
󠁿too far away from campus. At this rate, we might 
󠁿not make it back in time for school.

data.text:
That would be a problem… Air Groove told me that 
if I'm late again because of this she'll ban me from 
doing early morning training sessions…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿That would be a problem… Air Groove told me that 
󠁿if I'm late again because of this she'll ban me from 
󠁿doing early morning training sessions…

data.text:
Ahh, so that's why you asked us to be your lookouts, Senpai… 
That being said, I feel like we didn't do a good job of that…
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Ahh, so that's why you asked us to be your lookouts, Senpai… 
󠁿That being said, I feel like we didn't do a good job of that…

data.text:
W-Well why don't we rehydrate and take a breather? 
Then we can turn around and head back to campus!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
󠁿W-Well why don't we rehydrate and take a breather? 
󠁿Then we can turn around and head back to campus!

data.text: Eh, already? Okay…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Eh, already? Okay…

data.text: Really…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Really…?

data.text:
Hey now, you said it yourself didn't you!? If we keep pushing 
the vice-president's buttons, she'll give us such a frightening 
scolding that even monsters would run away in terror!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
󠁿Hey now, you said it yourself didn't you!? If we keep pushing 
󠁿the vice-president's buttons, she'll give us such a frightening 
󠁿scolding that even monsters would run away in terror!

data.text:
Hey now… You shouldn't bad mouth your seniors. After all, if 
you don't do anything to upset them, they won't be angry.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Hey now… You shouldn't bad mouth your seniors. After all, if 
󠁿you don't do anything to upset them, they won't be angry.

data.text: Sorry.
data.name: スズカ＆フクキタル
data.processed: 󠁿Sorry.

data.text: Oh, hello girls!
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: 󠁿Oh, hello girls!

data.text: Bright!? Wait, how long have you been following us…!?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Bright!? Wait, how long have you been following us…!?

data.text:
I was preparing to go for a run when I noticed you 
three… So pretty much from the beginning ♪
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
󠁿I was preparing to go for a run when I noticed you 
󠁿three… So pretty much from the beginning ♪

data.text:
Oh, is that so…!? 
Well why don't you join us for a run back to campus?
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, is that so…!? 
󠁿Well why don't you join us for a run back to campus?

data.text:
Your invitation brings me great pleasure ♪ However, 
I would prefer to follow you girls at my own 
pace, so please do not mind me.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
󠁿Your invitation brings me great pleasure ♪ However, 
󠁿I would prefer to follow you girls at my own 
󠁿pace, so please do not mind me.

data.text:
After all, I'm known to be very carefree. 
So please feel free to go at whatever pace suits you.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
󠁿After all, I'm known to be very carefree. 
󠁿So please feel free to go at whatever pace suits you.

data.text:
Hmm… Okay. Well then, we'll be heading back now. Hey, Suzuka, 
Fukukitaru, let's go… I'll see you later, Bright!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Hmm… Okay. Well then, we'll be heading back now. Hey, Suzuka, 
󠁿Fukukitaru, let's go… I'll see you later, Bright!

data.text:
See you later ♪ 
Huh…?
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
󠁿See you later ♪ 
󠁿Huh…?

data.text:
It seems as though the sakura blossoms are already beginning to 
bud… Perhaps those are winter sakura blossoms? Well, it may be 
faint, but it looks like spring is finally coming.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
󠁿It seems as though the sakura blossoms are already beginning to 
󠁿bud… Perhaps those are winter sakura blossoms? Well, it may be 
󠁿faint, but it looks like spring is finally coming.

data.text:
I guess in a sense… 
I'm just like them, merely a late bloomer.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
󠁿I guess in a sense… 
󠁿I'm just like them, merely a late bloomer.

data.text:
Until spring arrives, I'll continue 
to run in my lackadaisical manner ♪
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
󠁿Until spring arrives, I'll continue 
󠁿to run in my lackadaisical manner ♪

data.text: Ha, haa, hah, haa—
data.name: アヤベ＆トップロード
data.processed: 󠁿Ha, haa, hah, haa—

data.text:
We have reached the target distance… 
Let's take a break.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿We have reached the target distance… 
󠁿Let's take a break.

data.text: Okay!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿Okay!

data.text:
Phew… I love the early morning air! 
It's an amazing way to start off the day.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Phew… I love the early morning air! 
󠁿It's an amazing way to start off the day.

data.text:
Wait… Huh? Ayabe-san? 
Is there something wrong with my legs?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Wait… Huh? Ayabe-san? 
󠁿Is there something wrong with my legs?

data.text:
No… I was simply thinking that 
they were in as good a form as ever.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿No… I was simply thinking that 
󠁿they were in as good a form as ever.

data.text: Eh!? Thank you…!? E-Ehehe…
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿Eh!? Thank you…!? E-Ehehe…

data.text:
But that being said, you were taking the turns a bit too wide. 
You need to remember to keep your stride narrow…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿But that being said, you were taking the turns a bit too wide. 
󠁿You need to remember to keep your stride narrow…

data.text:
Ugh… You're right. I know it's a problem, 
but I'm not good at actually fixing it…
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Ugh… You're right. I know it's a problem, 
󠁿but I'm not good at actually fixing it…

data.text:
Ah, but I'm grateful for your advice! 
Ayabe-san, your advice is very sincere, so I appreciate it.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, but I'm grateful for your advice! 
󠁿Ayabe-san, your advice is very sincere, so I appreciate it.

data.text:
What's with you… I only said it because 
it would be problematic if you toppled over…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿What's with you… I only said it because 
󠁿it would be problematic if you toppled over…

data.text:
Wait… huh? Ayabe-san, do you hear that? Is someone… 
singing…? For whatever reason, the voice sounds familiar…
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Wait… huh? Ayabe-san, do you hear that? Is someone… 
󠁿singing…? For whatever reason, the voice sounds familiar…

data.text: Luu… Lalala… ♪
data.processed: 󠁿Luu… Lalala… ♪

data.text:
Top Road-san… We need to leave. 
 
Right now.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿Top Road-san… We need to leave. 
󠁿 
󠁿Right now.

data.text:
Oh, if it isn't you two!! 
The two bearers of my destiny!!
data.name: TM Opera O
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, if it isn't you two!! 
󠁿The two bearers of my destiny!!

data.text:
She's so fast…! But that's to be 
expected of you, O-Opera O-chan…!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿She's so fast…! But that's to be 
󠁿expected of you, O-Opera O-chan…!

data.text:
Ayabe-san and Top Road-san! Would you two… 
Umm… Err… Planning on joining the… Uh… 
Morning Dew's… Triumphant Return?
data.name: Meishodoto
data.processed:
󠁿Ayabe-san and Top Road-san! Would you two… 
󠁿Umm… Err… Planning on joining the… Uh… 
󠁿Morning Dew's… Triumphant Return?

data.text: What is that…?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿What is that…?

data.text:
Haa Hahaha! Doto, that was close but still incorrect! The 
correct title is "The Triumphant Return of the Supreme Ruler 
Under The Glimmer of the Morning Dew!"
data.name: TM Opera O
data.processed:
󠁿Haa Hahaha! Doto, that was close but still incorrect! The 
󠁿correct title is "The Triumphant Return of the Supreme Ruler 
󠁿Under The Glimmer of the Morning Dew!"

data.text:
Umm… So in other words, you're going for an 
early morning run along the riverbed or something?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Umm… So in other words, you're going for an 
󠁿early morning run along the riverbed or something?

data.text:
You're really, really, really, really, really close, but not 
quite. Now then, don't be shy you two. Come and join my ranks!!
data.name: TM Opera O
data.processed:
󠁿You're really, really, really, really, really close, but not 
󠁿quite. Now then, don't be shy you two. Come and join my ranks!!

data.text:
Ah, I would love to! 
Opera O-chan, Doto-chan, thank you for allowing me to join!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, I would love to! 
󠁿Opera O-chan, Doto-chan, thank you for allowing me to join!

data.text: Eh…? Hold on… Are you serious?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Eh…? Hold on… Are you serious?

data.text:
Of course! I'm positive I can learn to run better 
if I train on these rugged roads, and I can improve 
on what you pointed out to me.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Of course! I'm positive I can learn to run better 
󠁿if I train on these rugged roads, and I can improve 
󠁿on what you pointed out to me.

data.text:
Not only that, I've always wanted to race against Opera O-chan 
and Doto-chan! And this is the perfect opportunity for that!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Not only that, I've always wanted to race against Opera O-chan 
󠁿and Doto-chan! And this is the perfect opportunity for that!

data.text:
That's the type of attitude that will help create the age of the 
Supreme Ruler. Now then, let us be off! Haa Hahahahaha!!
data.name: TM Opera O
data.processed:
󠁿That's the type of attitude that will help create the age of the 
󠁿Supreme Ruler. Now then, let us be off! Haa Hahahahaha!!

data.text: Ahh jeez…!!
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Ahh jeez…!!
